title: Hoofz Dualie Squelchers
paragraphs: The Hoofz Dualie Squelchers is a main weapon in Splatoon 3, and is the Emberz-branded version of the Dualie Squelchers. It was added as part of the Splatlands Collection on 12 June 2025.

The Hoofz Dualie Squelchers resemble the Dualie Squelchers but with a new color scheme. The insides of the Dualie Squelchers are now a light blue while the outsides have a black and white color pattern similar to a zebra. The right Dualie Squelcher has a ring with six spikes added on the nozzle.
The Hoofz Dualie Squelchers comes with Point Sensor and Splattercolor Screen.
The word hoofz is a stylized spelling of the word hooves, which matches the zebra-print pattern on the weapon bodies thematically.
